00037 #ifndef _USB_H_
00038 #define _USB_H_
00039

00041 #include <core/core.h>

00044 /******************* Device Operations **********************/
00045 
00046 // use an own usb device
00047 usb_device * usb_open(u32 vendor_id, u32 product_id);
00048 usb_device * usb_open_class(u8 class);
00049 
00050 u8 usb_close(usb_device *dev);

00052 
00053

00057 u8 usb_set_altinterface(usb_device *dev, u8 alternate);

00059 
00065 u8 usb_reset(usb_device *dev);

00068 /******************* Control Transfer **********************/
00069 
00070 
00071 u8 usb_control_msg(usb_device *dev, u8 requesttype, u8 request, u16 value, u16 index, u16 length, char *buf, u16 size, u16 timeout);
00072 u8 usb_get_string(usb_device *dev, u8 index, u8 langid, char *buf, u8 buflen);
00073 u8 usb_get_string_simple(usb_device *dev, u8 index, char *buf, u8 buflen);
00074 u8 usb_get_descriptor(usb_device *dev, unsigned char type, unsigned char index, void *buf, u8 size);

00078

00085 u8 usb_u8errupt_read(usb_device *dev, u8 ep, char *buf, u8 size, u8 timeout);
